content: elizabeth rose afghan square julie yeager designs materials yarn aran weight - river washed xl by scheepjes 70% cotton 30% acrylic 50 g/1 75 oz ​ skein - 75 m/82 yds 1 skein each - a 989 yarra purple b 988 danube blue c 982 steenbras red d 986 mississippi orange hook i 5 5 mm crochet hook ​ size 12 square with 40 st and a chain-2 space on final side ​ pattern uses u s crochet terms chain-3 at beginning of round counts as a double_crochet use magic ​ ring to start if desired use standing stitches or chains at beginning of rounds as you prefer copyright 2019 julie yeager designs please do not post this pattern on the internet posting a link to my website - www julieyeagerdesigns com or to my ravelry store - where you can see all my patterns - http //www ravelry com/stores/julie-yeager-designs is appreciated contact me via e-mail at julieyeagerdesigns@gmail com ​ abbreviations and special stitches btrcl - beginning treble cluster of 3 chain - chain cluster - cluster double_crochet - double_crochet fpsc - front post single_crochet fptr - front post treble_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip sl - slip space - space st - stitch yo - yarn over treble_crochet - treble_crochet btrcl beginning treble cluster of 3 into designated st or space chain 3 treble_crochet to last step ​ leaving one loop on hook twice yo and pull through all 3 st on hook trcl treble cluster of 3 into designated st or space treble_crochet to last step leaving one loop on ​ hook three times yo and pull through all 4 st on hook fpsc front post single_crochet - insert hook behind post of stitch from front to back ​ yo pull through bring up even with last stitch completed yo pull through 2 loops 1 loop on hook fptr front post treble_crochet - yarn over twice insert hook behind post of stitch from ​ front to back yo pull through work treble as usual join with single_crochet standing stitch with slip knot on hook insert hook into designated stitch ​ ​ grab yarn pull through two loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops join with double_crochet with slip knot on hook yarn over insert hook into designated stitch grab yarn ​ pull through three loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops two loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops round 1 with color a chain 6 join with slip_stitch to form ring btrcl chain 3 trcl seven times chain 3 sl ​ st to top of bcl fasten_off 8 treble clusters of 3 8 chain-3 space round 2 with color b join with fpsc around top of any cluster working loosely 3 single_crochet around last ​ leg of cluster and the chain-3 space see photo fpsc around cluster eight times omitting last fpsc slip_stitch to first st 32 st round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st skip
